meanings.definition: The quality or state of being alternative.
meanings.sent1: Her alternativenesses in fashion choices always stood out.
meanings.sent2: The alternativenesses of his music taste made him unique.
meanings.sent3: The alternativenesses of her sandwich toppings raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: His alternativenesses in problem-solving approaches were refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The alternativenesses of the art exhibit left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The condition of being different or distinct from the usual or conventional.
meanings.sent1: The alternativenesses of the new restaurant's menu intrigued customers.
meanings.sent2: She embraced the alternativenesses of her cultural background.
meanings.sent3: The alternativenesses of his jokes always brought laughter.
meanings.sent4: The alternativenesses of her perspective opened up new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The alternativenesses of the technology amazed everyone.
